column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////All the toppings tasted fresh and the crust was crisp as can be. One thing about Malnati's is that even though it is a deep dish pizza
column2: it holds together very well. I've been to several other deep dish pizza places where the entire pizza just falls apart when you eat it
column3: but at Lou Malnati's the pizza is well composed. At other places
column4: don't even think about picking it up and eating it with your hands
column5: you need a knife and fork
column6: but at Malnati's you can pick it up perfectly find and the crispy delicious buttery crust holds everything together like a champ!
